pages.text: $(tool)Silk Touch$() allows you to mine blocks in their original form, without breaking them into drops.$(br2)$(important)Note:$() This effect requires only 1 level - additional levels provide no extra benefit.

pages.title: Primary Material
pages.text: $(d)Amethyst Shard$() grants $(tool)Silk Touch +1$()$(br2)The delicate crystal for delicate mining!

pages.title: What It Does
pages.text: Silk Touch allows you to collect:$(li)Grass blocks (not dirt)$(li)Stone (not cobblestone)$(li)Glass without breaking it$(li)Ore blocks themselves$(li)Ice, Packed Ice$(li)Mycelium, Podzol$(li)Spawners (depends on game rules)

pages.title: Conflicts
pages.text: $(important)Silk Touch conflicts with Fortune!$()$(br2)If both effects are present, Silk Touch takes priority.$(br2)Use separate tools for Fortune and Silk Touch, or carry jewel-swapping tools!
